name: Haircalf Envelope Crossbody Bag // Leather Envelope Purse
description:
Super cute crossbody leather purse with beautiful printed haircalf flap.

Available in :
Taupe w/ zig zag haircalf flap
Distressed Brown w/ houndstooth haircalf
Dark Brown w/ houndstooth haircalf
Ginger w/ houndstooth haircalf flap
(Solid colors are a separate listing)

Flap can stay shut with help of buckle on front.
Bag is structured, and leather is beautiful and durable.
Bag can be worn as a crossbody or remove the strap and used as a clutch!
Strap features a buckle for maximum adjust-ability!

Bag is unlined and features one interior pocket.
Side seams are raw edge and reversed.
Perfect for everyday use, just throw in wallet, phone, sunglasses, keys and more!

Dimensions:
W:9"
H: 6.5"
D: 1.5"
Strap drop (length from top of shoulder to top of bag): 20" - 23"

Please feel free to ask questions if ya got 'em!

name: Basically Beautiful Leather Tote - Oil Tanned Leather Big Tote
description:
Large leather tote. Roomy and spacious. 
--Free Shipping to US!!
Unlined leather bag with one interior pocket.
Heavy duty snaps on the sides to close top opening of bag.
Leather is beautiful and durable oil tanned leather.

Dimensions:
H: 15"
W: 13.25"
D: 6"
strap drop: 7.75"

Please feel free to ask questions if you have any!
Thanks!

name: Leather Bucket Bag
description:
Leather drawstring bucket bag, with fun tassels at the end of drawstrings!
FREE domestic shipping!
Your choice of Black or lovely Brown leather is beautiful and durable oil tanned leather.
Bag is unlined, with one exterior pocket and one interior pocket. Hardware finish on black is nickle, on brown - gold.
Strap features adjustable buckle strap.
Fun and functional bag! Perfect for all day, everyday use!

Dimensions:
H: 10"
W: 8"
D: 5"
Strap drop: 18" - 22"

Please do note hesitate to ask any questions you may have....I do custom orders as well!!
If you'd like a special color, just ask!

name: Leather Envelope Crossbody
description:
Here is a fun shoulder / crossbody leather purse. Currently only available in Ginger, Black and Burgundy.

Flap can stay shut with help of buckle on front.
Bag is structured, and leather is beautiful and durable.
Bag can be worn as a crossbody or remove the strap and used as a clutch!
Strap features a buckle for maximum adjust-ability!

Bag is unlined and features an exterior pocket on the back.
Side seams are raw edge and reversed.
Super roomy and perfect for day into evening use!
Can fit an I pad or other tablet.

H: 9"
D: 1.5"

name: Roomy Leather Tote with Ipad sized Envelope pocket
description:
Large leather tote. Roomy and spacious.
--Free Shipping to US!!
Beautiful bag available in three lovely fall colors: Black, Ginger and Burgundy. Bag is structured and is durable and beautiful quality.

Features a front pocket that will nicely fit an Ipad (or any other tablet of your choice...as long as it's smaller than an ipad!)
Front compartment stays shut with help of small buckle
Bag is unlined with one interior pocket.

Dimensions:
H: 15"
W: 13.25"
D: 6"
strap drop: 8"

Please feel free to ask questions if you have any!
Thanks!

name: Large Ginger Leather Tote
description:
Beautiful and large leather tote. Perfect to hold all your everyday necessities.
Bag is unlined and has one interior pocket. Free shipping to US.

Reversed seams on sides and bottom and tassel on front give the basic tote the perfect detail to make it stand out from others.

Dimensions:
H: 14"
W: 19"
D: 4"
handle drop: 9"

Leather is quality slightly buffed leather in an ginger and taupe colors, perfect for Fall!

This leather is slightly distressed and there may be minor imperfections which only confirm the authenticity of the leather.
This marks will enrich the product as time goes by. 

Please note that I have tried to correctly display the color of the bag, if you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact me!
